actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to defer payment of municipal and industrial water supply costs of the Dickinson Unit.

summary.text: Amends the Reclamation Authorization Act of 1975 to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to permit the deferral of water service payments until the municipal and industrial costs for the modification of the spillway of Dickinson Dam, North Dakota have been repaid.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to defer payment of municipal and industrial water supply costs of the Dickinson Unit.
